Our Artists

  • ASHLEY
  • JERRY
  • JESSICA
  • MIKE

Amber Smith

Hi All! My name is Amber, and I am a neo-traditional style tattoo artist. I really like to do out of the box pieces and make the POP. I really like to work with darker colors, but I am down for pretty much anything! Stop in and let’s talk about a design or send us an email and mention me in it. I look forward to creating something with you!

Jerry Zap

Hello, my name is Jerry and I am an old school traditional tattoo artist. Bold will hold! I like to create my work with bold lines and saturated colors. I mostly focus on old school tattooing, but I am ready to work with anything and put a traditional twist on it. Come into the shop sometime and let’s talk! You can also email the shop and mention my name in the email address. Let’s create something bold that will last a life time!

Jessica Jones

HI THERE!! I am Jessica and I am an artist here at Bold Ink. I really like to create vibrant tattoos with crazy colors. I have a little bit of a nerdy side and love to create flash of your favorite games or movies! Come check out my flash or let’s talk about creating something beautiful together! Stop in the shop and ask for you or send us an email mentioning my name!

Big Mike

What’s up? My name is Mike, but I am known around here as Big Mike. I am a black and gray artist here at Bold Ink. My work is mostly traditional style but done in dark blacks and bold lines with saturated shading. I have a lot of my own work that we can do or throw me some ideas and I we make it work! Come on into the shop or send us an email mentioning my name.
